extension.description: Agent Chat History Summary Manager - Manage and search your AI chat history summaries
viewsContainer.title: My Last Chat
view.chatList.name: Chat Summaries
command.refresh.title: Refresh Chat List
command.createNew.title: Create New Chat Summary
command.openSettings.title: Open Settings
command.openFile.title: Open Chat Summary File
command.openInEditor.title: My Last Chat (Editor view)
command.createNewFromPanel.title: Create New Chat Summary
config.title: My Last Chat
config.storageLocation.description: Storage location for chat summaries: workspace (in workspace) or global (global storage)
config.globalStoragePath.description: Global storage path (used when storageLocation is global)
config.autoHideControls.description: Automatically hide top search and filter controls when scrolling the list
tool.getLastChatsList.description: Get a list of all chat summaries, returning title, description and metadata
tool.getLastChatsList.feedbackLevel.desc: Level of detail for returned information: TITLE_ONLY (title only), DESCRIPTION (title + description), META (all metadata), ALL (full text)
tool.getLastChatsList.scope.description: Search scope: workspace (workspace only), global (global only), all (all)
tool.searchByTitle.description: Search chat summaries by matching keywords in the title
tool.searchByTitle.keywords.description: List of search keywords, multiple keywords expand the search scope
tool.searchByMeta.description: Search chat summaries by matching keywords in metadata
tool.searchByMeta.keywords.description: List of search keywords, will match in all metadata fields
